Name: Serial Cleaners
About the game: Get rid of the bodies, make the place spotless, and don't get caught. Plan every step and move like a ghost or trust your reflexes and thrive in chaos. The choice is yours. Alternate between four characters, each with a unique skill set, opening up new possibilities. Serial Cleaners’ setting—inspired by cult ‘90s movies—will bring back fond memories of the more carefree decade full of brightly colored optimism... and the grime underneath it all.
